title: Highlights 1.5.1 – Turns PDF annotations into Markdown
content: Highlights is a PDF reader that extracts highlighted text, notes, and image selections from PDFs and lets you share them via email, archive them to shoebox applications such as Evernote, DEVONthink, and VoodooPad, or just save them to portable formats such as Markdown and HTML.   PDFs are like paper, abundant and made for reading. title: Stellar Phoenix Video Repair 2.0.0.1 – Easily repair video files
content: Stellar Phoenix Video Repair is an efficient video repair tool which repairs corrupt or damaged videos including MOV files that are unplayable in QuickTime. The tool repairs video affected from various issues like sound corruption, header corruption, movement corruption, duration corruption, and change in format. title: M4VConverter Plus 4.3.8 – Convert videos and extract audio
